H0.text: Of which US rock band is Anthony Kiedis a founder member and lead singer. Foo Fighters

H1.text: Of which US rock band is Anthony Kiedis a founder member and lead singer. Audioslave

H2.text: Of which US rock band is Anthony Kiedis a founder member and lead singer. Queens of the Stone Age

H3.text: Of which US rock band is Anthony Kiedis a founder member and lead singer. Rhcp

A4.text: The Red Hot Chili Peppers are an American rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1982, consisting of Anthony Kiedis (vocals), Flea (bass), John Frusciante (guitar), and Chad Smith (drums).
